entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gull Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:47 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 70%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 70 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
